creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: color photo montage; face of a woman with yellow skin, with wet hair, at right, partially covered by a red flower; man's hand to left of woman's face; interior view of a laundry room with red washer, dryer, and cabinets through a doorway at center; room with yellow walls, window with orange curtain, orange plant, and blue table and chair; black borders
signed: LLC in white: Sandy Skoglund \'86 20/25 Red Flower
title: Red Flower
